stocks.impact_theory: Meta announced a multi-year partnership deploying millions of Nvidia chips in a new data center, signaling sustained AI infrastructure demand. Economically, this validates hyperscaler capex on AI, boosting Nvidia's revenue visibility. Market psychology: Reinforces Nvidia as AI kingpin, countering bubble fears. Historical parallels: Similar to 2023 MSFT-AZ deals sparking rallies. Analogies: 1) Fuel to rocket - chips power AI explosion. 2) Pickaxe in gold rush - Nvidia profits regardless of app winners.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Web searches confirm NVDA up 2-2.5% on Meta deal; X posts highlight rebound and dip-buying. Strong sentiment shift from recent volatility to confirmed demand.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 5-8% gains on continued AI hype; target $152.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short risky, potential 3% loss if Fed minutes dovish.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Overvaluation, competition from AMD, supply chain issues.

stocks.justification: Multiple sources confirm deal impact, consistent X buzz, historical precedent strong.

stocks.impact_theory: Reports of Apple pushing AI wearables like smart glasses and camera AirPods decoupled it from Nasdaq weakness. Implications: Diversifies beyond iPhone, taps wearable AI market. Psych: Seen as safe AI play amid volatility. Parallels: AirPods launch 2016 +20%. Analogies: 1) Glasses as new iPhone. 2) Siri upgrade like Maps fix boosting trust.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Up 3.2% today per X and news; sentiment shift to AI innovator vs laggard.

potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short for 2% if no product confirmation.

stocks.justification: Rumor-based but strong price action and decoupling narrative.

stocks.impact_theory: Danaher agreed to acquire Masimo for $9.9B all-cash (~$200/share premium). Boosts diagnostics portfolio. Psych: Acquisition frenzy in medtech. Parallels: 2023 device M&A wave. Analogies: 1) Pawn to queen in chess. 2) Lottery win for shareholders.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long to deal close +15%; arb opportunity.

stocks.impact_theory: Q2 earnings beat ($1.03 EPS vs $0.96) but FY guide weak due to deal drags. NGS ARR +33% positive but margins pressured. Psych: Rotation from cyber. Parallels: CRWD post-earnings dips. Analogies: 1) Sugar crash after binge. 2) Overpromise underdeliver.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Down 6-10% post-earnings; X criticism on guide.

stocks.impact_theory: Appaloosa increased stake; HBM/DRAM prices soaring. Ties to AI memory demand. Psych: Smart money bet. Parallels: 2024 memory rally. Analogies: 1) Reservoir for AI thirst. 2) Co-pilot to NVDA.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: +5.9% on stake news; X hype on $1000 target.

stocks.justification: Stake news solid but cyclical sector.
